attributes.action: Remove anyone with confirmed links to Extremist from UK
attributes.additional_details:
I am calling for anyone who has confirmed links to any extremist groups to be removed from the United Kingdom and never be allowed to return.

I believe that the safety of British people should be  prioritised ahead of the views of any British political party or any human right legistation.

Whilst the recent events in France have highlighted the dangers these people pose, the truth is, there are similar people living in Great Britain as i type this who wish to harm innocent people. Yous know exactly who these people are through your intelligence agencies and rather than "monitor them", yous cannot take any risks with innocent British peoples lifes and must put safety first by removing them immediately. It is a basic right that people in Britain should be protected before ANY of these extremists human rights.

If the extremist was not born in this country, they have to be returned to there country of origin as soon as possible.
